column5: Well I leave this weekend for a 1 week of fishing at Tatnall camp near WAWA. Any tips on how and what to use for fishing during this time of year?Also any basic tips on what to bring would be nice.I have a good list of things to bring already.Almostly need to know where the fish are at during this time of year? deep water etc.I will be taking a train. any good tips as how to pack for the train ride would also be helpful,Thanks and good fishing to all :)
